headline: A Look At Ventas (VTR) Valuation After Recent Results And Strong Shareholder Returns
summary: Why Ventas is on investors’ radar today Ventas (VTR) has been attracting attention after posting annual revenue of US$5,817.438m and net income of US$251.381m. These figures give investors fresh numbers to assess this large healthcare focused REIT. See our latest analysis for Ventas. Ventas’ recent financial update comes after a strong run, with an 11.8% year to date share price return and a 30.4% total shareholder return over the past year. This suggests positive sentiment is building around...

headline: Baron Real Estate Income Fund Q4 2025 Portfolio Activity
summary: We added to our senior housing investment theme by purchasing additional shares of Ventas, Inc.
